data.title: Where To Watch Plan B (2023) TV Series: Season 2
data.meta_description: If you're a fan of the Canadian miniseries, check out this guide on how and where to watch 'Plan B' (TV series) season 2.
data.text:
Table of Contents

How & Where to Watch Plan B (2023) TV Series: Season 2

CBC released 'Plan B' season 1 in early 2023. Now, the time-travel drama's second season is at hand, so we put together this guide on how and where to watch 'Plan B' (TV series) season 2.

Written by Kit Copson (Writer, Briefing Editor)

Reviewed by Aleksander Hougen (Co-Chief Editor)

Last Updated: 2024-08-07T09:19:01+00:00

All our content is written fully by humans; we do not publish AI writing. Learn more here.

Key Takeaways: Where to Watch Plan B TV Series

Subscribe to a decent streaming VPN like ExpressVPN and download its app.

Open the VPN’s server list and connect to a Canadian server.

Open CBC Gem and start watching ‘Plan B.’

What to know about Plan B:

Background: ‘Plan B’ (2023) — not to be confused with ‘Plan B’ the movie — is a Canadian TV series based on the original French language series (2017) of the same name.

Production: KOTV Productions is behind ‘Plan B’ while Red Arrow Studios International takes care of international distribution.

Plot Summary: The series explores the concept of traveling back in time to change things for someone living with regret and whether this is truly the means to a “perfect life.”

Best VPN for Streaming Plan B

Not available in your country?

Status checked 2024/08/15:

Canadian anthology series ‘Plan B’ was released in early 2023 to mixed reviews. While some weren’t impressed, others have described it as “original,” “intense” and “one of a kind.” If you’re game for the upcoming second season but are concerned about geoblocking getting in the way, you need this guide on where to watch ‘Plan B’ (TV series) season 2 from anywhere.

The series is available to stream online for free but if you’re not in Canada, you’ll need a plan B. This comes in the form of a reliable VPN with Canadian servers, like ExpressVPN. If you’re wondering what a VPN is and how you can use one for streaming, we’ll answer all your burning questions in this guide.

Plan B TV Series: Seasons 1 & 2 Plot & Summary (No Spoilers)

‘Plan B’ (2023) season one saw Phillip Grimmer travel back to the past to make some changes in the hopes of fixing his troubled relationship and career quandaries. A mysterious agency named Plan B makes this possible, but it soon becomes clear that time travel is far from the perfect solution we often imagine it to be.

Season two will focus on a different storyline, that of Mia Coleman, a police officer who dealt with a case that unexpectedly ended in tragedy. Going back in time proves beneficial for Mia’s career but also forces her to confront some difficult truths about herself.

‘Plan B’ season two will be released on Sunday, Aug. 11, 2024 on CBC Gem. The episode will air at 8 p.m. ET on CBC and go online on CBC Gem at the same time. A time zone converter may be helpful if you live outside the Americas.

Where to Watch Plan B (2023 TV Series) Online Free?

You can watch ‘Plan B’ (2023) for free on CBC Gem, a Canadian free streaming platform. It’s available only in Canada but we’ve got some good news for fans overseas: You can still access CBC Gem and stream ‘Plan B’ as long as you’re using a secure and fast VPN service.

Is Plan B (TV Show) on Netflix?

No, ‘Plan B’ isn’t on Netflix, but content agreements between streaming services change regularly. This means that even if a show or movie isn’t on Netflix at the moment, it may be in the future if Netflix acquires the rights to it. For now, ‘Plan B’ is only on CBC Gem.

How to Watch Plan B in USA and Other Countries Outside Canada

If you’re outside Canada feeling disappointed because you can’t access CBC Gem to watch your favorite drama series, there’s a quick and easy solution. Follow these steps to connect to a good streaming VPN (we’ll use ExpressVPN as an example) and watch ‘Plan B’ from wherever you are.

If you don’t already have one, you’ll be prompted to sign up for a free CBC Gem account. In addition, even if ‘Plan B’ isn’t on Netflix right now, as we mentioned above, this might change in the future.

Download the VPN to Your Device

Download the VPN from the website and open the file to install it.

Connect to a Canadian Server

Launch the VPN app and navigate to the server list. Choose a Canadian server and click “connect.”

Stream ‘Plan B’

Open CBC Gem, sign in or create your account and start streaming.

FAQ: Plan B (Show) Season 2

‘Plan B’, the Canadian time travel anthology series, is not on Netflix. There is a series on Netflix called ‘Plan A Plan B’ but this is not related.

Season one has six episodes. We couldn’t confirm at the time of writing how many will be in season two.

Yes. ‘Plan B’ season two will be released on Aug. 11, 2024.

‘Plan B’ by kykNET is an Afrikaans series unrelated to the Canadian miniseries of the same name. It has five episodes.
